title: [Liath Bheinn, Ridge]
description: Swirling purple heather covers the barren mountain plateau.  A few moths are tossed around by the gusty wind, their already short lifespan haughtily put in peril by the forces of nature.

Swirling purple heather brightens up the barren mountain plateau.  A few frost-blue butterflies are tossed around by the gusty wind, their already short lifespan haughtily put in peril by the forces of nature.
